dramatic_tan.name: Dramatic Tan & Shadow
dramatic_tan.description: Creates a dramatic, tanned or dusky skin tone with shadowy lighting, ideal for intense or gritty scenes.

golden_hour.name: Golden Hour Romance
golden_hour.description: Warm, soft, and bright lighting that evokes a feeling of romance and nostalgia.

youth_flashback.name: Youth Flashback
youth_flashback.description: A younger, softer appearance with slightly brighter lighting to signify a memory or flashback.

action_hero.name: Action Hero
action_hero.description: A determined, serious look with dramatic lighting, ready for an intense action sequence.

found_footage_horror.name: Found Footage Horror
found_footage_horror.description: An unsettling look with harsh, direct lighting and wide-eyed fear, perfect for a jump scare moment.

comedic_exaggeration.name: Comedic Exaggeration
comedic_exaggeration.description: An over-the-top happy expression with a wide smile and bright, even lighting for a comedy scene.

masculine_appearance.name: Masculine Appearance
masculine_appearance.description: Applies strong masculine facial structures for a more traditionally male look.

feminine_appearance.name: Feminine Appearance
feminine_appearance.description: Applies delicate feminine facial structures for a more traditionally female look.

full_beard_style.name: Full Beard Style
full_beard_style.description: Instantly adds a prominent, full beard to create a rugged, weathered, or commanding character for a scene.
